#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
bool is_digit_present(int temp , int d)
{
    while ( temp )
    {
        if( temp % 10 == d)
            return true;
        temp = temp / 10;
    }
    return false;
}

int main()
{
    int t , d , n , temp =0;
    cin >> t;

    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> n >> d;
        while( n )
        {
         if( !is_digit_present( ++temp, d) )
         {
             n--;
         }
        }
        cout << temp << endl;
        temp = 0;
    }
    return 0;
}
